info.name: Shorty
info.description: Shorty offers a service to store, manage and use a collection of short links pointing to ressources in the web. The features are a combination of a centralized bookmarks collection, an url shortener and an access control. The collection is presented as a link of "shorties", a shorty can be created either manually in the list ("New") or by using the "Shortlet". The Shortlet is something like a Booklet, a JS based bookmark meant to be stored inside the bookmark toolbar or area of a web browser. When clicked, the page currently open in the browser will be offered to be added to the list of existing shorties. For more information see: http://apps.owncloud.com/content/show.php/Shorty?content=150401
info.author: Christian Reiner
